title: Order
description: The order placed for a product list.

xdm:purchaseId.title: Purchase ID
xdm:purchaseId.description: Unique identifier assigned by the seller for this purchase or contract.

xdm:purchaseOrderNumber.title: Purchase Order Number
xdm:purchaseOrderNumber.description: Unique identifier assigned by the purchaser for this purchase or contract.

xdm:payments.title: Payment List
xdm:payments.description: The list of payments for this order.

xdm:currency.title: Currency
xdm:currency.description: The ISO 4217 currency code used for the order totals.

xdm:priceTotal.title: Price Total
xdm:priceTotal.description: The total price of this order after all discounts and taxes have been applied.
